channel.title: CVE Feed for Philip M. Hofer (Frumph) -- Comic Easel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Philip M. Hofer (Frumph) -- Comic Easel

item.title: CVE-2024-31092|2024-08-02T01:46:04.479Z -- philip%20m.%20hofer%20%28frumph%29 -- comic%20easel
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Philip M. Hofer (Frumph) Comic Easel allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Comic Easel: from n/a through 1.15.
